reviewText: This DVD is the best out there right now to teach drinkmaking techniques to home bartenders and people looking for ways to make better drinks for their friends. Highly recommended if you're looking for the best tips and tricks, as well as the basics of entertaining for friends and professionals too.

I love to collect mixed drink DVD this DVD is the one of DVD  i like to watch. I hope you will enjoy watching this DVD like me and you can learn how to make drink at home too. I love this DVD it is very funny DVD.  I have Volume 1 and 2.
